messages.msgSnippet: ... Kobo-daishi s armour? Kobo-daishi s ARMOUR?? Say WHAT? What do you mean by yamabushi? If you mean sôhei, warrior monks, their armour was the same as
messages.messageBody:
Tom Hatfield wrote:

> hi all
>
> im trying to find information about yamabushi armor and what it constisted
> of. i found a picture of Kobo-Daishi's armor but thats all ive found and its
> not a good pic.

Kobo-daishi's armour? Kobo-daishi's ARMOUR?? Say WHAT?

What do you mean by yamabushi? If you mean sôhei, warrior monks, their armour
was the same as everyone elses.

Tony

--

Anthony J. Bryant

messages.messageBody:
hi all

im trying to find information about yamabushi armor and what it constisted of. i found a picture of Kobo-Daishi's armor but thats all ive found and its not a good pic.

thanks for any help





Tom Hatfield

"In all forms of stratagy, it is necessary to maintain the combat stance in everyday life, and to make your everyday stance your combat stance."

-Miyamoto Musashi, The Book of Five Rings,
